title: Indrani Polki Haaram with Emerald and Ruby Pendant
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Features a delicate Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases intricate filigree work along the necklace strand, adorned with dazzling Polki diamonds. The pendant features a striking teardrop-shaped Ruby, encircled by Emeralds and a halo of Polki diamonds. Peacock motifs (Mayura designs), are gracefully integrated into the design, adding a touch of tradition and auspiciousness. The pendant is finished with cascading emerald and pearl drops.
colors: Cream (Pearls). The classic combination of emerald green
and gold is traditionally considered auspicious in South Indian jewelry.
occasions: and other special occasions. Its contemporary design also makes it suitable for upscale modern events and celebrations.
description: This Haaram is a beautiful fusion of traditional craftsmanship and modern design sensibilities. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and vibrant gemstones ensures brilliance and timeless elegance. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, while the intricate peacock motifs add cultural significance. A true statement piece that will be cherished for generations.
